sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs"> <x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <definition>Management and oversight of Corporate IT: policy, governance, portfolios, IT budget review, Clinger-Cohen Act support, applications management, computer/network defense & security, Information Assurance Oversight/training, and FISMA compliance. Also includes the labor/material costs for Command IT infrastructure: Servers, Application Hosting, Networks, System Administration (for IT that is not specific to another functional GWBS), Licenses (for IT that is not specific to another functional GWBS), applications/portal development & procurement, and Blackberries (excludes NMCI contract blackberries, use GWBS 5.1.12).</definition> <number>GWBS0001482</number> <parent_task display_value="5.1.4 Information Technology Management">bb158176db91a3008e9357935e9619b3</parent_task> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-25 15:59:55</sys_created_on> <sys_id>bb158176db91a3008e9357935e9619b3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-25 17:01:11</sys_updated_on> <task_code>5.1.4</task_code> <task_name>5.1.4 Information Technology Management</task_name> <task_title>Information Technology Management</task_title> </x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs> </record_update>
